#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	int i,t,n,j;
	ll ans,sum;
	vector<int> v(100001);
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		ans=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&(v[i]));
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			sum=0;
			for(j=i;j<=n;j=j+i)
				sum+=v[j];
			ans=max(ans,sum);
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
	return 0;
}
